item.title: GoLang
item.description: 文档 go语言中国 go语言博客 Step01.Ubuntu installs the go language development(发育;开发;生产) environment Ubuntu download go-sdk and extract(解压) it to /usr/local go language official website set environment variables 1 sudo gedit ~/.bashrc
